briefTitle: Treatment of Breast Cancer With Trastuzumab + HS627/ Pertuzumab + Docetaxel
officialTitle: A Phase III Study to Compare HS627 vs. Pertuzumab on the Efficacy, Safety and Immunogenicity in Combination With Trastuzumab and Docetaxel as Neoadjuvant Therapy in Patients With Early-stage or Locally Advanced HER2 Positive Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of participants achieving Pathological Complete Response (pCR) as Assessed by the Independent Review Committee (IRC)
